title: Dragon Trainer Tristana V.O bug, please fix !
body:
I just played a game where i had Dragon Trainer Tristana and the ennemy was playing Tristana with the Riot free skin (the pink one).

I had all her basic voice over lines like "who wears a helmet",  instead of the cute skin ones...

Please fix fast !

replies.body:
Hey Windrunner! 

Thanks for the report! We've received several reports regarding this issue and are in the process of identifying the root cause. ^-^

UPDATE: We think we've found the issue and are verifying!
